author: nflaig
content: following up on the discussion regarding `committee_index` in produce attestation data calls, we will make the parameter optional for post-electra, this could be a first step to eventually make it optional on the spec as well, see https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/pull/7626

author: nflaig
content: did minimal change for this https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/517, we could also add `AttestationData` for electra but since 0 is also valid pre-electra I don't think this should be done + there is no CL spec update in electra to `AttestationData` container
